name: Curse of Z
description:
Curse of Z is a story about a guy living in a cursed mansion where everyone in it is turned into zombies and he have to find the mansion key and escape the mansion to free himself and remove the curse from the mansion .
The game includes : running, jumping, shooting (normal gun and shotgun) and sound effects.
Future updates: collection of items new weapons new abilities more levels.
This game developed for Global Game Jam 2016
